A: The top three students will receive the following prizes: Winner: ₦5 Million Scholarship 1st Runner-up: ₦2 Million Scholarship. 2nd Runner-up: ₦1 Million Scholarship. text: Role of Insurance in Keeping Families Safe and Secure.” Q: What are the prizes to be won? A: The top three students will receive the following prizes: Winner: ₦5 Million Scholarship 1st Runner-up: ₦2 Million Scholarship. 2nd Runner-up: ₦1 Million Scholarship. Winner’s School : ₦1 Million Gran Q: How can I apply? A: To apply, visit www.heirsinsurancegroup.com/essay, fill in the required details, and upload your essay document. Q: What are the participation guidelines? A: Please adhere strictly to the participation guidelines below, non-compliance will result in disqualification. Word count: Not more than 500 words. Essays should be typed and not handwritten. Students must write their name, school and class on the essay document. Document Format: Word document only. Students must save their essay document with their full name. NOTE: Participants must upload their passport photograph and any form of ID when submitting their application form. Q: What is the submission timeline? A: The submission portal will open on May 27, 2025 , and close on July 8, 2025 . Ensure your entry is submitted by this deadline. Q: Can my child/student submit more than one entry? A: No, only one entry per student is accepted. Multiple submissions from the same

text: timeline? A: The submission portal will open on May 27, 2025 , and close on July 8, 2025 . Ensure your entry is submitted by this deadline. Q: Can my child/student submit more than one entry? A: No, only one entry per student is accepted. Multiple submissions from the same student will be disqualified. Q: Can I assist my child/student with the essay? A: Parents and Teachers can assist students by registering and submitting the essay on their behalf, but they should not help with the writing of the essay itself. This is to ensure the originality of the student’s work. Q: How will I know if my submission was successful? A: Once your essay has been successfully submitted, you will receive a confirmation message. Q: How will the winners be selected? A: Essays will be evaluated by a panel of judges based on creativity, clarity, relevance to the topic. Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize FAQs Q: What is the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: The Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize is a new initiative designed to recognize and reward teachers who actively promote insurance education and awareness in their classrooms or communities. text: Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize FAQs Q: What is the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: The Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize is a new initiative designed to recognize and reward teachers who actively promote insurance education and awareness in their classrooms or communities. This is an opportunity for teachers to inspire students and their peers about the importance of insurance in everyday life. Q: Who can participate in the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: This prize is open to all teachers in primary and secondary schools across the country who are involved in promoting insurance education or awareness in their schools, classrooms, or local communities. Q: How can I participate in the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: To participate, teachers must submit a detailed entry that showcases how they are promoting insurance literacy, either in the classroom or in the wider community. The submission should include: A description of the activities or lessons conducted that promoted insurance awareness. Evidence of the impact these activities had on students or the community (e.g., feedback, photos, videos, etc.). Any teaching materials used to explain insurance concepts. Teachers can submit their entries online through the official submission portal starting on May 27, 2025. Q: What are

text: lessons conducted that promoted insurance awareness. Evidence of the impact these activities had on students or the community (e.g., feedback, photos, videos, etc.). Any teaching materials used to explain insurance concepts. Teachers can submit their entries online through the official submission portal starting on May 27, 2025. Q: What are the rewards for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: The winner of the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize will receive: A ₦1 Million cash prize. A ₦500,000 grant for their school. Q: What are the eligibility criteria for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: Teachers are eligible for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize if they: Are employed at a primary or secondary school within Nigeria. Have promoted insurance education through activities, lessons, or awareness programs, either in the classroom or within their local community. Submit a valid entry demonstrating their efforts to raise awareness about the importance of insurance. Q: What is the submission deadline for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: The submission portal for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize will open on May 27, 2025, and the deadline for submissions will be July 8, 2025. All entries must be submitted by this date. text: is the submission deadline for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: The submission portal for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize will open on May 27, 2025, and the deadline for submissions will be July 8, 2025. All entries must be submitted by this date. Q: Can I submit more than one entry for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: No, each teacher is only allowed to submit one entry for the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize. Please ensure that your entry is comprehensive and covers all relevant information. Q: Can schools submit on behalf of a teacher? A: No, the submission must be made by the teacher themselves. Schools can, however, encourage their teachers to participate and support them in compiling their entries. Q: How can I get more information about the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize? A: For more information about the Teachers’ Insurance Awareness Prize, please visit www.heirsinsurancegroup.com/essay or reach out to our team at: Email: [email protected] or [email protected] Phone: 07004347754 or 07004347746 Share This : Related Post Blog Heirs Insurance Creators Fellowship Delivers Educational Content Thursday, September 4, 2025 General News Agusto & Co.
